mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (comment, user_id, book_id, createTime) VALUES(#{comment.comment}, #{comment.userId}, #{comment.bookId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO `like` (comment_id, user_id, createTime) VALUES(#{commentId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.comment, c.user_id AS userId, c.book_id AS bookId, c.createTime, u.user_name AS userName, l.id AS likeId, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `like` AS l WHERE l.comment_id = c.id) AS likeNumber FROM comment AS c LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `like` AS l ON l.user_id = u.id AND l.comment_id = c.id WHERE c.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY ${orderBy} DESC
